predicate.note: Frames file for 'locate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'base' and 'find'.

roleset.name: be located in

example.name: typical usage
example.text: The plastics plant is located *trace* on an 800-acre tract in the heart of the petrochemical corridor that reaches along the U.S. Gulf Coast.
example.arg: on an 800-acre tract in the heart of the petrochemical corridor that reaches along the U.S. Gulf Coast

roleset.note: Could take an agent ("John located his company in Philadelphia") but that'd be a little bizarre.

example.name: passivized
example.text: The telephone number for the charity in Shelton, Conn., has been disconnected, and the former officials couldn't be located *trace*.

example.name: with finder
example.text: After much searching, John finally located his teddy bear.
